climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Pillows to Relieve Neck & Back Pain】The memory foam pillows fits automatically according to the body curve to relieve and release your muscles and physical and mental pressure. With the personalized customized shape, the neck pillow perfectly to your head, neck and shoulders for the perfect combination of comfort and edge-to-edge support. Bringing a reduction of stress in the cervical vertebra and spine. Improving sleep and relieving neck and shoulder pain discomfort, rejuvenating your body.

【Safe & Odorless-Premium Memory Foam Pillows】Our bed pillow is made of CertiPUR-US and Oeko-Tex certified memory foam, which provides amazing comfort and soft yet sturdy support for sleep. When lying on our Pillow, it feels like floating on water or clouds, without any pressure on your skin. Special 3 seconds fast rebound memory foam won't change its shape and firmness due to season. Unleash your best sleep with our foam pillows- The ultimate blend of comfort, style, and quality!

【Reshape The Perception of Fit for All Sleepers】Innovative design of bread for back-sleeper keeps your head supported and balanced that enables your muscles to relax and recover. The memory foam pillow for neck pain is designed for multiple sleeping positions, such as side sleeping, supine, stomach sleeping, back sleeping and low pillow sleepers etc. HAMYODO sleeps unlike anything you've experienced for all kinds of sleepers.

【Cooling and Dual-sided Washable Pillowcase】 The cooling pillows one side is made of cool-to-the-touch ice silk fabric, which provides a refreshing and comfortable sensation. The other side is crafted with breathable and soft Tencel knit fabric, offering a cozy and relaxing experience. The breathable outer pillowcase with meshed sides will keep you cool and it is removable and machine washable. Lay your head on the best, whether you prefer comfort, cooling, or extra support.

【Purchase with Confidence & Timely After-Sales Service】You spend about one-third of your life sleeping, so a good pillow is a must-have. HAMYODO memory foam pillows which helps reduce neck problems and efficiently improves your sleep definitely is a great choice! Perfect gift for elderly, office, students and all ages people. If for any reason you're not satisfied with our bed pillows, please feel free to contact us. We offer 12-month product worry-free and friendly customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and cool (both meanings)
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pillow for my very particular significant other. I have purchased 6 different brands/kinds of pillows to no avail. I knew the next attempt had to be well thought out.. enter Amazon reviews! The ratings and reviews led me to purchase this pillow and it was the right choice. Soft but not too soft and double-sided for the “cooler than the other side of the pillow” fan. So far very impressed with the quality memory foam. Will report back after Mr. Picky has had enough time to find a gripe. I think it feels amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This pillow is great
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is awesome! It doesn't get flat and if you lift your head even for a second, it springs back to its original shape. It isn't hard and isn't too soft. It provides nice support, yet feels soft. It's pretty much the best. And it doesn't cost a ton of money either

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Pillow!
reviews.reviewText: I slept at my brother's house and the first thing I asked was "Where did you get this pillow?" He sent me an Amazon link and I ordered one for myself! This pillow is awesome! It doesn't get flat and if you lift your head even for a second, it springs back to its original shape. It isn't too hard and isn't too soft. It provides nice support, yet feels soft. It's pretty much perfect. And it doesn't cost a ton of money either! GREAT PILLOW!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little pillow
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pillow for my son to replace one of those bamboo pillows that went flat after about 6 months. This pillow is a little thinner than I was expecting, but so far it is holding up really well. I like the cover on it, it is very thick and will repell moisture. My son said it stays cool for him and he has been sleeping much better since using it. The only thing I did not like was that it did emit a smell when we first opened it, which is typical for foam. However, after a few days it dissipated. But great pillow for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Supportive yet soft
reviews.reviewText: I loved the support of my old memory foam pillow compared to regular fluffy pillows. However, it tended to be stiff and dense, and towards the end it was getting worn out, so I bought this as a replacement. What a pleasant surprise that it's everything I hoped it would be! It's thick and supportive but isn't stiff or heavy. I can lie on my side or back, and even my stomach (I change positions frequently so this is perfect), and it conforms to my head without my feeling like I'm sinking into it or only lying on top of it. It's springy and readjusts quickly.When I first took the pillow out of its packaging, I was worried that it was going to be too thin or squishy, but after giving it time to decompress and warm up, it's thick and plush. I can't make any claims as far as pain relief because I've never had problems with pillows except when they're too fluffy. I also don't have a problem with pillows being too warm and this one isn't either, but I appreciate the flip side of the zip-on case that provides a cooler-feeling material for warmer nights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pillow itself is fine but I made the error of not letting the pillow air out enough before using it. The next morning I woke up feeling so dizzy and nauseous I could barely stand. Turns out I was experiencing "off gasing" and it was miserable. So buyers please let this pillow air out alot longer than the 6 hours I did before using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but good
reviews.reviewText: The pillow is a little smaller (shorter) than I expected but it sleeps great. Never gets hot and has good support. Very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Comfy Pillow! Great texture too!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pillow because my old pillow was starting to hurt my jaw during the night. I tested five different flat shaped pillows and this one was the best by far. After sleeping on it the first night, I felt much more relaxed in my jaw and I got a great night sleep. I would recommend this pillow for anyone looking for a nice flat pillow with support but isn't too firm. This pillow has nice cooling action as well and is convenient for travel as well. Overall great purchase!
